title: 245: Jess’ Haunted Home Saga + Matt James “Cheating” & Our Unpopular Opinions On It!
itunes:title: 245: Jess’ Haunted Home Saga + Matt James “Cheating” & Our Unpopular Opinions On It!
description:
The Broads are back and take the first half of the episode to discuss past and current ghost hauntings in Jess’ home (00:00:00 - 00:53:00). Then they dive into the current #bachelor drama that is Reality Steve’s reporting on Matt James, Rachael, and Grace - The Broads explain what they know about the current situation and workshop how they are feeling and their opinions about it (00:53:01 - end). What do you think, Broads?

*Join The Broads this Thursday for a wild episode with a very special guest and join The Chatty Bros this Friday for a new episode discussing their last episode and answering a lot more personal questions!

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
